movie_title: The wonders of hair - 6 Minute English
introduction: Learn English vocabulary and practise your listening skills as we look into some interesting facts a

vocabulary.definition: small raised areas that appear on the skin because of cold, fear, or excitement
vocabulary.example: The scary movie gave her goose bumps all over her arms.

vocabulary.definition: to make something appear larger or fuller by standing the hairs up
vocabulary.example: The cat fluffed up when it saw a dog in the garden.

vocabulary.definition: having little or no hair on the head, experiencing hair loss
vocabulary.example: He jokingly referred to his bald spot as being follically challenged.

vocabulary.definition: to grow again, to replace or redevelop something
vocabulary.example: The company plans to regenerate the old building into a modern office space.

vocabulary.definition: scary or thrilling, causing great fear or excitement
vocabulary.example: The haunted house provided a hair-raising experience for all visitors.

vocabulary.definition: the condition of having little or no hair on the scalp
vocabulary.example: His baldness became more noticeable as he aged.
